document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

: 41
. Type-species:
Syringophilus dendroicae
Clark, 1964
, by original designation.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 207 ), paratypes : females, males at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Anthreptes malacensis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Nectariniidae ), type-locality: SE ASIA (
Skoracki & Glowska 2008 b
).

cardueli Skoracki, Hendricks and Spicer, 2010 : 36
, figs. 14–23 .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
dendroicus (
Clark, 1964
)
,
Syringophilus dendroicus
Clark, 1964
: 86
, figs. 5, 18 , 21 ;
Aulobia dendroicus,
Kethley 1970
: 41
, figs. 23, 24 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female lost (
Kethley 1970
), lectotype at AMU (Syr. 240 ), paratypes : females, males at AMU .

Hosts and distribution.
Setophaga coronata
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Parulidae ), type-locality: USA , Florida and Georgia (
Clark 1964
,
Kethley 1970
);
S. nigrescens
( Parulidae ), USA , California, Riverside (
Skoracki et al . 2010 a
).

Type material.
Holotype female at MRAC , paratypes : females, males at MRAC , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Prinia erythropterus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Cisticolidae ), type-locality: TOGO , Kamina (
Skoracki & Dabert 2001 b
).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 204 ), paratypes : females, male, nymphs at AMU , ZISP , ZSM . Host and distribution:
Leucosticte arctoa
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Fringillidae ), type-locality: EUROPE (Skoracki 2011 b).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 205 ), paratypes : females, males at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Cinnyris jugularis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Nectariniidae ), type-locality: NEW
GUINEA
(
Skoracki & Glowska 2008 b
);
Leptocoma sericea
( Nectariniidae ), NEW
GUINEA
, ( AMU , ZISP ) (
Skoracki & Glowska 2008 b
).

stachyris (
Bochkov, Mironov and Skoracki, 2001
)
,
Syringophilopsis stachyris
Bochkov, Mironov and Skoracki, 2001
: 237
, figs. 10–13 ;
Aulobia stachyris, Skoracki 2011 b: 107
, figs. 75–77 .
Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (T-Sy- 23 ), paratypes : females, male at ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Cyanoderma pyrrhops
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Timaliidae ), type-locality: NEPAL , Thirkhed-hunga (Bochkov et al . 2001 ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
sylviae
Bochkov and Mironov, 1998
: 9
, figs. 12–16 ;
Syringophilopsis faini
Bochkov and Apanaskevich, 2001
: 321
, figs. 1, 2 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (T-Sy- 3 ), paratypes : females, males at ZISP .

Hosts and distribution.
Sylvia atricapilla
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Sylviidae ), type-locality: RUSSIA , Kaliningrad Prov., Kurshskaya Spit Rybachiy Village (
Bochkov & Mironov 1998
); POLAND , Zachodniopomorskie, Darlowo Wschodnie, Bukowo-Kopan, ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2011 b), FRANCE , Provence- Alpes-Côte d'Azur, Nice, ( ZISP ) (Skoracki 2011 b), RUSSIA , ( ZISP ) (
Bochkov & Mironov 1998
);
Sylvia curruca
( Sylviidae ), RUSSIA , Kaliningrad Prov., Kurshskaya Spit Rybachiy Village (
Bochkov & Mironov 1998
); POLAND , Zachodniopomorskie, Darlowo Wschodnie, Bukowo-Kopan, ( AMU , ZISP , ZSM ) (Skoracki 2011 b), JORDAN , Al-Dhleil, ( AMU ) (
Glowska et al . 2007
, Skoracki 2011 b), KAZAKHSTAN , ( ZISP ) (
Skoracki & Bochkov 2010
; Skoracki 2011 b);
S. nisoria
( Sylviidae ), CROATIA , Dalmatia, ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2011 b), POLAND , Zachodniopomorskie, Swinoujscie, ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2011 b).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at MRAC ( 187371 ), paratype : female at MRAC . Hosts and distribution.
Sylvietta whytii
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Macrosphenidae ), type locality: RWANDA (
Fain et al. 2000
); KENYA , Amboseli, ( AMU , LMEE ) (Klimovičová et al . 2014 a). Habitat. Unknown.

Type material.
Holotype female at MRAC , paratypes : females, males at MRAC , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Sylvietta virens flaviventris
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Macrosphenidae ), type-locality: TOGO , Adina (
Skoracki & Dabert 2001 b
).
